landing.title: Human and Environmental Impact through Social Enterprise

social.socialText: With a young dynamic population that is eager to contribute to the global economy, East Africa has a lot to offer to the world. Now is the time to nurture sustainable, inclusive and scalable business. The rest will take care of itself.

cooperative.coopText: Elewa has one shared objective; To unlock the true potential of individuals, teams, and the community. We believe strongly in the power of sharing ideas and continuously strive to grow each other and ourselves. Internally, but also within the larger communities in which we are active.

beyond.beyondText: We channel a good amount of our resources into giving back. Through projects such as our coding school in Kakuma refugee camp, training teachers in pastoral Samburu and our open-source coding initiatives providing entry-level opportunities to hundreds of junior engineers These projects don't necessarily have an immediate financial return, but their impact can be tangibly measured in the long-term.

open.openText: What we learn, we share. Through community events, open knowledge repositories, regular teaching moments (everyone a teacher) and academic partnerships. We build for today, with a lens on tomorrow.

projects.projectsText: Become part of our mission and join elewa.

Headquarters.address: The Promenade, 19 General Mathenge Rd, Nairobi, Kenya

invest.head: Trade, not aid
invest.title: Southern innovations addressing global problems
invest.text: The global South is rapidly catching up with the 'developed' world. It's time for you to get to know the rapid development, innovation and drive going on in this part of the world (East-Africa, South Asia and beyond).

stakeholder.title: Elewa NV, a multi-stakeholder cooperation
stakeholder.textOne: At the heart of Elewa lies the structure Elewa NV. Based in Brussels, Belgium, Elewa NV is a private holding company which controls the assets of all Elewa activities.
stakeholder.textTwo: Elewa NV is owned and controlled by Elewa's founder, a small community of investors which share in the vision of Elewa and Elewa employees based throughout the activities of the group.

creative.title: The Elewa Creative Hub
creative.textOne: Coming soon; The Elewa Creative Hub Lies at the heart of our organization. A two-acre property at the center of Nairobi's creative district, the hub connects all Elewa's Activities under a single banner.
creative.textTwo: Through partnerships with creative community, the Elewa Hub will organize vibrant activites that bring talents from different fields (tech, business, art, fashion) together to nurture continuous innovation.

Investing.title: Investing in Elewa NV
Investing.textOne: From time to time, we offer investment opportunities (private equity & debt) to out community of investors. Interested to take part when this opportunity arrives?
